text: György Károly (Károly György, 31 August 1953 – 26 October 2018) was a Hungarian poet and writer. He was born in Budapest. He published his first poems in the weekly Élet és Irodalom (“Life and Literature”) magazine. His best known novels were Folyamatos május and Dunakanyaró. Károly died on 26 October 2018 in Szigetszentmiklós, Hungary from brain cancer, aged 65.Death announcement on official website ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of György Károly * Terebess Online Category:1953 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Hungary Category:Hungarian novelists Category:Hungarian poets Category:Writers from Budapest
title: György Károly
